text: He had a horrible cold feeling that he was the most important thing you've ever heard.

passages.fragment: He had a horrible cold feeling that he was
passages.full_quote: <used>He had a horrible cold feeling that he was</used> about to lose Random for ever

passages.fragment: feeling that he was the most important
passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: What he was going to do he didn't know, but <used>feeling that he was the most important</used> person in the Universe gave him the confidence to believe that something would turn up

passages.fragment: that he was the most important thing
passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: And with it had come the clear and extraordinary knowledge <used>that he was the most important thing</used> in it

passages.fragment: the most important thing you 've ever heard
passages.full_quote: I've got to tell you <used>the most important thing you've ever heard</used>
